title: DC52 - Lantern Corps Chronology - part 1
description:
Welcome to a Lantern Corps Chronology.  This should be all of 
the appearances of the various members of the Lantern Corps in 
the DC new 52 up to date.  This will take care of everything up 
through the First Lantern War, plus a bit more.  The Off 
Continuity stuff is presented at the end in separate folders.

None of these scans are mine, just collected and collated.  
Thanks to those responsible.  The spice must flow!

You will the find the following Authors and more:  Mark Waid, 
Peter J. Tomasi, Peter Milligan, Geoff Johns, Grant Morrison, 
Dan Jurgens, Joe Harris, Judd Winick, Dan Didio, Tony Bedard, 
Jeff Lemire, Keith Giffen, Justin Jordan, Robert Venditti, 
Charles Soule, Brian Buccellato, J.M. Dematteis, Jimmy Palmiotti, 
Tom Taylor, Derek Fridolfs, dustin nguyen, JT Krul

You will the find the following Artists and more:  Ivan Reis, 
Fernando Pasarin, Ardian Syaf, Jim Lee, Gene Ha, Rags Morales, 
Aaron Lopresti, Mark Castiello, Yildiray Cinar, Marcus To, 
Jason Fabok, Ed Benes, Geraldo Borges, Tyler Kirkham, 
Doug Mahnke, Claude St. Aubin, Mike Choi, Marcio Takara, 
Andres Guinaldo, Jorge Jimenez, Miguel Sepulveda, Tomas Giorello, 
Renato Guedes, Aaron Kuder, Ethan VanSciver, Cafu, Andrei Bressan, 
Chriscross, Steve Pugh, Will Conrad, Scott Kolins, Tom Raney, 
Phil Winslade, David Finch, Bret Booth, Brad Walker, Van Jensen, 
Billy Tan, Alessandro Vitti, Sami Basri, Justin Gray, 
Jheremy Raapack, Axel Gimenez, Mike Miller, Howard Porter

The Comics will be in either .cbr or .cbz format.

All titles are from the DC Universe.

The language is English.

Enjoy!
